name: financetracker
description: a web application to track financial transactions.

scripts.setupAll: npm run installAPI && npm run installAngular && npm run installMobile
scripts.preparer: npm run setupAll && echo "$(tput bold) run '$(tput smul)$(tput setaf 1)$(tput setab 7)npm start$(tput sgr 0)' to get to application runing "
scripts.buildAngular: echo "'$(tput smso)You will have to configure android Studio to run this.'" && cd ./mobileApp && npm run android

author: Keith Franklin Jathanna (keith30895@gmail.com)
